nodes.text: Corellian rescue frigates were a type of disc-hulled Corellian frigate. During the Clone Wars, the Galactic Republic's Space Rescue Corps most commonly used Sprint-class rescue crafts on their missions, but used Corellian rescue frigates for larger jobs.
Corellian rescue frigates were first mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars roleplaying products.
